## User Story

**As a** [role]  
**I need** [function]  
**So that** [benefit]

---

### Details and Assumptions
- [ ] Document what you know
- [ ] Mention relevant branches or artifacts

---

### Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
Given [some context]  
When [an action is taken]  
Then [the expected outcome]
```
